alert.note: Alert for Frontier; Hayes; Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 8:24PM CDT until August 04 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Frontier County in southwestern Nebraska... Southeastern Lincoln County in southwestern Nebraska... East central Hayes County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 824 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles east of Lake Maloney State Recreation Area to 7 miles northwest of Curtis to 7 miles northeast of Hayes Center, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Curtis, Brady, Eustis, Maxwell, Moorefield, Stockville, Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area, Keith, Maywood, Quick, Cottonwood Canyon State Wildlife Management Area, Hansen Memorial Reserve State Wildlife Management Area, Jeffrey Canyon State Wildlife Management Area, Freedom, Orafino, Bluegill Haven Campground, Vroman and Dancing Leaf Earth Lodge. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 184 and 207. Highway 83 between mile markers 29 and 51. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
